idea-plugin.name: cybrosys assista : odoo helper
idea-plugin.description:
cybrosys assista - Intelligent Odoo Development Assistant

Accelerate your Odoo development with smart code completion, templates, and best practices enforcement.

Assista is a comprehensive PyCharm plugin designed specifically for Odoo developers. It provides intelligent code suggestions, automated module generation, and development best practices to streamline your Odoo project workflow.

Key Features

Module Template Generator

  • Instant Module Creation: Generate complete Odoo modules with proper structure and boilerplate code
  • Multiple Templates: Choose from Basic, Advanced, Theme, OWL Basic/Advanced, and Systray modules
  • Ready-to-Use Structure: Includes models, views, security, manifest, and initialization files

Available Module Templates:

TemplateDescription
Basic Odoo ModuleMinimal module with essential files, simple model, basic views, and security
Advanced Odoo ModuleComplex models, multiple view types, enhanced security, demo data, and documentation
Theme ModuleWebsite theme with custom templates, CSS/JS assets, and design components
OWL Basic ModuleMinimal OWL JavaScript components with templates and integration
OWL Advanced ModuleComplex OWL modules with state management, controllers, and rich interactions
Systray ModuleCustom systray icons and menus for the Odoo web client top bar

Smart File Creator

  • Python Files: Generate __init__.py, __manifest__.py, Models, and Controllers with proper imports
  • XML Files: Create Views, Menus, Actions, Reports, Security, Settings, and Cron jobs
  • CSV Files: Generate security access files with proper structure
  • Pre-filled Content: All files come with context-aware, Odoo-specific boilerplate

Python File Templates:

  • __init__.py - Module initialization with encoding and imports
  • __manifest__.py - Complete manifest with metadata and dependencies
  • Odoo Model - Model class with fields and basic methods
  • Odoo Controller - Web controller with HTTP routes

XML File Templates:

  • Basic/Advanced Views - Form and tree views with proper structure
  • Inherited Views - XPath-based view extensions
  • Reports - Printable report templates and actions
  • Menus & Actions - Navigation and window actions
  • Security - Access control rules and group definitions

Code Snippet Assistant

  • 100+ Snippets: Extensive collection of Python and XML code snippets
  • Keyword Activation: Type "odoo" to access field definitions, API decorators, view templates, and more
  • Context-Aware: Automatically detects model context and fills in appropriate names and IDs
  • Best Practices: Follows Odoo development standards and conventions

Visit the official site to Access CheatSheet

Smart Suggestions

  • Intelligent Completions: Context-aware suggestions for model names, fields, and class names
  • Python Support: Completions for comodel_name, inverse_name, @api.depends, @api.onchange, _name, _inherit
  • XML Support: Smart suggestions for model attributes, field names, and record structures
  • Reduced Errors: Helps prevent common coding mistakes

Odoo Standards Inspection

  • Code Quality: Built-in inspections for Python, XML, and CSV files
  • Standards Compliance: Detects violations of Odoo development best practices
  • Real-time Feedback: Highlights issues in model definitions, field parameters, and XML structures
  • Consistent Code: Ensures adherence to Odoo coding standards across projects

Perfect For

  • Odoo developers of all skill levels
  • Teams working on Odoo customizations and modules
  • Anyone looking to speed up Odoo development workflow
  • Developers who want to follow Odoo best practices

Supported File Types

  • Python (.py) - Models, Controllers, Wizards
  • XML (.xml) - Views, Actions, Menus, Security, Reports
  • CSV (.csv) - Security definitions and data files

What You Get

  • 6 different module templates for various use cases
  • 12+ file creation templates with smart content
  • 100+ code snippets for common Odoo patterns
  • Intelligent auto-completion for Odoo-specific code
  • Real-time code quality inspections
  • Context-aware suggestions and error prevention

Quick Start

  1. Create Module: Right-click project folder → Odoo Module Templates → Select template
  2. Add Files: Right-click folder → New → New Odoo File → Choose type and template
  3. Use Snippets: Type "odoo" in Python/XML files to see available snippets
  4. Get Suggestions: Enjoy intelligent completions while coding

Save hours of development time and write better Odoo code with Assista!
